item.description: Ndef(\x, { a=3; b=2; z = [a,b,(a*a) + (b*b) ** 0.5]; Splay.ar(Ringz.ar(Impulse.ar(4/z), z*440*(Ndef.ar(\x)+1), 0.2)) }).play; //wellâ€¦ #SC
item.author: telephon

item.description: play { Ringz.ar(TDuty.ar(Dseq(20 / "I'm sitting in a ringz".ascii, inf)).lag(0.001), 0, 1).clip / 2 } #supercollider
item.author: telephon

item.description: @muellmusik play { Splay.ar("Zum Wohl!".ascii.collect{|c, i|Ringz.ar(Impulse.ar(1, 1/5 * i), c * 4, 2, 0.1)}.scramble) }//#supercollider
item.author: telephon

item.description: f = Duty.kr(_, 0, Dseq("hi scott".ascii, inf)); play { RLPF.ar(Saw.ar(f.(1/8)), f.(1/7)*8, 0.1) } #sc #supercollider
item.author: telephon

item.description: Ndef(\,{ TDuty.ar(Ndef.ar(\_,2),0,0.5) }).play; Ndef(\_,{ Demand.ar(Ndef.ar(\).reverse,0, Dseq({ 0.3.rand } ! 14, inf)) });//#supercollider
item.author: telephon

item.description: a = {|x,n| if(n>0) { a.(SinOsc.ar(MouseX.kr(3, 5)**(n-1)*x, x*[1,-1]), n - 1) } {x} }; play { a.(40, rrand(3, 10)) * 0.1}// #supercollider
item.author: telephon

item.description: Ndef(\x, { var r = SinOsc.ar(Ndef(\x).ar, [0, pi]); Splay.ar(max(sin(r[0] * ({ exprand(1.0, 3000.0)}!8) + LFNoise1.kr(1!8)),0))*0.4 }).play;
item.author: telephon

item.description: @jaclong Hi, it's supercollider code. You install SuperCollider, and run the code. This one plays the sequence from "On the Run"(pink floyd)
item.author: earslap

item.description: play{x = PinkNoise.ar(0.1!2);x+FreqShift.ar(x, [0.15,0.1501])} // homesick for good old Brighton-by-the-sea #supercollider
item.author: headcube
